note.p: Sister of Sarah Hawthorn, who married Leonard Jenyns in 1862 (ODNB s.v. Blomefield, Leonard). Married Thomas Boycott in Stapleford, Cambridgeshire, in 1871.
Census returns 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1759/628/10)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 8 October 2018)
Scotland, select births and baptisms, 1564–1950 (Ancestry.com, accessed 8 October 2018)
